label: 白馬寺
本: Kaempfer's Japan:  Tokugawa Culture Observed . University of Hawai'i Press . 1999
著者: Kaempfer, Engelbert; ed. trans. annot. by Beatrice M. Bodart-Bailey
説明文: [HW: Baima si; earliest known Buddhist temple in China established under the patronage of Emperor Ming in the Eastern Han capital Luoyang in the year 68.]
